source_sentence: 佛說時非時經
translation: Sutra on the Hours and the Untimely

source_sentence: 天竺三藏法師若羅嚴譯
translation: Translated by the Indian Tripiṭaka Master Jorāyam

source_sentence: 如是我聞：一時，佛住王舍城迦蘭陀竹林園精舍。
translation: Thus I have heard: One time, the Buddha was staying at the Kalandaka's Bamboo Grove Monastery in Rājagṛha.

source_sentence: 時，佛告諸比丘：「我當為汝說時非時經，善思念之！」
translation: The Buddha then addressed the monks, "I will explain to you the Sutra of Hours and Out of Hours, so consider it well!"

source_sentence: 諸比丘言：「如是，世尊！
translation: The monks said, "So it is, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 當受教聽。」
translation: You will be instructed to listen."

source_sentence: 佛告諸比丘：「是中何者為時？
translation: The Buddha addressed the monks, "Which of these is the right time?

source_sentence: 何者為非時？
translation: What is the wrong time?

source_sentence: 比丘當知。
translation: A monk should know this.

source_sentence: 「冬初分，「第一十五日，七脚為時，四脚半非時；「從八月十六日至三十日。
translation: "In the first quarter of winter, "on the fifteenth day, seven feet are the time and four and a half feet are not the time;" "from the sixteenth day of the eighth month until the thirtieth day.

source_sentence: 「第二十五日，八脚為時，六脚八指非時；「從九月一日至十五日。
translation: "On the twenty-fifth day, eight feet are in season, and six feet and eight fingers are out of season; "it lasts from the first day of September to the fifteenth day.

source_sentence: 「第三十五日，九脚為時，七脚六指非時；「從九月十六日至三十日。
translation: "On the thirty-fifth day, when nine feet are present, seven feet and six fingers are not present at the time; "from the 16th day of September until the 30th day.

source_sentence: 「第四十五日，十脚為時，八脚三指非時；「從十月一日至十五日。
translation: "On the forty-fifth day, when ten feet are visible, eight feet and three fingers are not at the time; "from the first of October until the fifteenth day.

source_sentence: 「第五十五日，十一脚為時，九脚四指非時；「從十月十六日至三十日。
translation: "On the fifty-fifth day, when eleven feet are visible, nine feet and four fingers are not at the right time; "from October 16 to 30.

source_sentence: 「第六十五日，十二脚為時，十一脚六指非時；「從十一月一日至十五日。
translation: "On the sixty-fifth day, when twelve feet are visible, eleven feet and six fingers are not at the right time; "from the first day of November ... to the fifteenth day of the month.

source_sentence: 「第七十五日，十一脚半為時，十脚三指非時；「從十一月十六日至三十日。
translation: "On the 75th day, when 11 1/2 feet are visible, 11 feet and three fingers are not visible; "from the 16th day of November ... to the 30th day of the month.

source_sentence: 「第八十五日，十一脚為時，九脚四指非時；「從十二月一日至十五日。
translation: "On the eighty-fifth day, when eleven feet are visible, nine feet and four fingers are not, "from the first day of December ... to the fifteenth day of the month.

source_sentence: 「春初分，「第一十五日，十脚為時，八脚少三指非時；「從十二月十六日至三十日。
translation: "On the first fifteenth day, when ten feet are in season, eight feet and three fingers less are out of season; "from the sixteenth day of December until the thirtieth day.

source_sentence: 「第二十五日，九脚半為時，七脚少三指非時；「從正月一日至十五日。
translation: "On the twenty-fifth day, nine and a half feet is the time, and seven feet less than three fingers are not the time; "it lasts from the first day of the first month until the fifteenth day.

source_sentence: 「第三十五日，九脚為時，六脚少三指非時；「從正月十六日至三十日。
translation: "On the thirty-fifth day, when nine feet are visible, six feet lacking three fingers are not timely; it's from the 16th day of the first month ... to the 30th day of the first month.

source_sentence: 「第四十五日，八脚為時，五脚少三指非時；「從二月一日至十五日。
translation: "On the forty-fifth day, when eight feet are visible, five feet lacking three fingers are not timely; it's from the first day of the second month ... to the fifteenth day of the month.

source_sentence: 「第五十五日，七脚為時，三脚少三指非時；「從二月十六日至三十日。
translation: "On the fifty-fifth day, when seven feet are visible, three feet lacking three fingers are not timely; "it lasts from the 16th day of February until the 30th day.

source_sentence: 「第六十五日，六脚為時，三脚少四指非時；「從三月一日至十五日。
translation: "On the sixty-fifth day, when six feet are visible, three feet short of four fingers are not timely; "from the first day of March ... to the fifteenth day of the month.

source_sentence: 「第七十五日，五脚為時，三脚少三指非時；「從三月十六日至三十日。
translation: "On the 75th day, when five feet are visible, three feet lacking three fingers are not timely; "from the 16th day of March ... [to] the 30th day.

source_sentence: 「第八十五日，四脚為時，二脚少一指非時；「從四月一日至十五日。
translation: "On the eighty-fifth day, when four feet are visible, two feet lacking a finger are not timely; "it lasts from the first day of April until the fifteenth day.

source_sentence: 「夏初分，「第一十五日，三脚為時，二脚少四指非時；「從四月十六日至三十日。
translation: "On the first fifteenth day, three feet are for the time, and two feet are missing four fingers; it's not for the time from the sixteenth day of the fourth month until the thirtieth day.

source_sentence: 「第二十五日，二脚為時，一脚少五指非時；「從五月一日至十五日。
translation: "On the twenty-fifth day, two feet are for the time, and one foot is five fingers short of the time; "from the first day of May until the fifteenth day.

source_sentence: 「第三十五日，二脚半為時，一脚少三指非時；「從五月十六日至三十日。
translation: "On the thirty-fifth day, when two feet are halved, one foot is missing three fingers; it's not the time; it's from the sixteenth day of May until the thirtieth day.

source_sentence: 「第四十五日，三脚半為時，二脚少二指非時；「從六月一日至十五日。
translation: "On the forty-fifth day, when three and a half feet are visible, it's not the time for two feet to lose two fingers;" "from the first day of June ... to the fifteenth day.

source_sentence: 「第五十五日，四脚半為時，二脚半非時；「從六月十六日至三十日。
translation: "On the fifty-fifth day, when four and a half feet are visible, two and a half feet are not visible;" "from the 16th day of June until the 30th day of June.

source_sentence: 「第六十五日，五脚為時，三脚非時；「從七月一日至十五日。
translation: "On the sixty-fifth day, when five feet are visible, three feet are not visible; it's from the first day of July ... to the fifteenth day of the month.

source_sentence: 「第七十五日，五脚半為時，三脚半非時。
translation: "On the 75th day, five and a half feet are in season, and three and a half feet are out of season.

source_sentence: 「從七月十六日至三十日。
translation: "It lasts from the 16th day of the seventh month ... to the 30th day of the 30th month.

source_sentence: 「第八十五日，六脚為時，四脚半非時；「從八月一日至十五日。
translation: "On the eighty-fifth day, when six feet are visible, four feet are half-not visible," it says, "from the first day of August until the fifteenth day.

source_sentence: 「如是，諸比丘！
translation: "So it is, monks!

source_sentence: 我已說十二月時非時，為諸聲聞之所應行，憐愍利益故說。
translation: I've explained that December is neither the time nor the hour, and I've explained it for the benefit of śrāvakas who should practice it out of pity.

source_sentence: 我所應作已竟，汝等當行。
translation: Once you've done what I should do, you should practice it.

source_sentence: 若樹下空處，露坐思惟。
translation: If there's an empty place under a tree, sit out in the open and contemplate it.

source_sentence: 諸比丘！
translation: Monks!

source_sentence: 莫為放逸，後致悔恨，是我所教戒。」
translation: Don't be careless, for this will later lead to regret; these are the precepts I teach."

source_sentence: 佛說經竟。
translation: After the Buddha finished speaking the sūtra, the monks were all greatly encouraged to uphold it.

source_sentence: 時諸比丘，皆大歡喜，勸助受持。
translation: The monks rejoiced and encouraged them to uphold it.

source_sentence: 佛說時非時經
translation: The Buddha taught the Sutra of Hours and Out of Hours

source_sentence: 「因緣輕慢故，　　命終墮地獄，　因緣修善者，　　於此生天上，　緣斯修善業，　　離惡得解脫，　不善欲因緣，　　身壞入惡道。」
translation: "It's because of causes and conditions that they despise that they fall into hell at the end of their lives; causes and conditions that cultivate goodness are here in heaven; causes and conditions that cultivate good actions are free of evil and lead to liberation; and causes and conditions of unwholesome desires are corrupted and lead to a bad destiny."

source_sentence: 天竺三藏法師若羅嚴，手執梵本，口自宣譯。
translation: The Indian tripiṭaka master Rājagṛha translated the Sanskrit text with his hand and mouth.

source_sentence: 涼州道人，于闐城中寫訖。
translation: A Daoist from Liangzhou finished writing it in the city of Tan Tan.

source_sentence: 「披褐懷玉，　　深智作愚，　　外如夷人，　內懷明珠，　　千億萬劫，　　與道同軀。」
translation: "Clad in brown robes and carrying jade, profoundly wise and acting foolishly, he's like a barbarian on the outside but carries a bright pearl on the inside, and he shares the same body with the Way for a thousand billion eons."
